tutorial.speak:
For advanced search, navigate to the People icon on the Chums dashboard.
Click on Advanced in the Search window. In this example, we will search for all men over 21 years of age.
Choose a field you would like to search.
Any of the default fields can be searched.
Next, choose an operator.
Choose a value.
Save the condition if you plan on adding other conditions.
Add another condition.
Choose the field, operator, and value.
Click Search.
Seven men are in the database who are over 21.
You can download a CSV file of this list.
